PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04472018-04-20,  ,  ,  ,  ISED,  NRC
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Research Council of Canada - Research Council Employees' Association ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder Approving that the National Research Council of Canada ENTER into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Research Council Employees' Association that covers all employees in the Operational Category for the period beginning on July 31, 2015 and ending on July 30, 2018 and is on the same terms and conditions as the previous collective agreement, except for the changes set out in the summary of changes.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
